item.title: (RuneScape Forums) Found this gem of a thread today
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Sir Ormsby :

Jagex, you should raise the age limit to 40, or take my rant into consideration.

Wtf thats just wrong!

[quote=“Sir Ormsby , post:17, topic:291583”]PROBLEM:
First of all, combat is horrific. This teaches children that they can kill random people and will be rewarded for their murder, rather than punished. This also encourages the murder of animals like cows and chickens. Dairy farmers must be terrified. The list of attackable monsters is too long, but I also must mention unicorns. Yes, unicorns! Unicorns are magical and they are meant to be our friends, I hold Jagex responsible for their extinction.

SOLUTION:
Instead of encouraging violence, everyone on RuneScape should be friends. The attack emote should be changed to a hug emote, and the HP bar should be a love meter. We should hug creatures until we fill the love meter, and then they can reward us. This is a safe alternative to violence.[/quote]
Wtf is this guy Gay? “Change the Attack to Hug”
There is nothing wrong with RuneScape because its all VIRTUAL and how can something Virtual like RuneScape lead to Murder…

This guy is just plain weird

Read full topic
item.source: (RuneScape Forums) Found this gem of a thread today

item.title: (RuneScape Forums) Found this gem of a thread today
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:36, topic:291583”][quote author=kF link=topic=385304.msg2896455#msg2896455 date=1249247544]
He was trolling, you fuckwit… no need to get all emotional about it.

A “fool”, huh? I think we all know who’s the “fool” here.
[/quote]

Okay, Mr. Smartass. I’ll remove my posts then. The only reason I thought it was real was because he went so far with it and went into detail… I mean, who would wanna waste their time doing that? Wow, okay. He got me, but there’s a first time for everything though.[/quote]

So do credit card scams. Darwin’s natural selection for a new age, I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: (RuneScape Forums) Found this gem of a thread today
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

[quote=“Bmaw, post:4, topic:291583”][quote]SOLUTION:
Instead of encouraging violence, everyone on RuneScape should be friends. The attack emote should be changed to a hug emote, and the HP bar should be a love meter. We should hug creatures until we fill the love meter, and then they can reward us. This is a safe alternative to violence.
[/quote]
[sarcasm]Dumbass. Of course he is serious. Did you even read it?[/sarcasm]

[quote]SOLUTION:
Take away every item in the game except for toy soldiers and the toy hot air balloons. These objects are very necessary to encourage creativity and crafts in children. I think that Jagex should also create a website for scrapbooking.
[/quote]

[quote]PROBLEM:
There is music in RuneScape! There are several types of music which are bad and promote naughtiness. Children may listen to RS music, which would lead to listening to rap, and they could grow up to become a rogue street thug. This must be prevented!
[/quote]

Are you fucking serious.[/quote]

Read full topic

Hahaahahaa! What a fucking faggot! Jesus Christ! What the fuck is wrong with this kid/adult/whateverthefuck? This person needs to lay off the heroin.
